scripts.postinstall: flow-mono create-symlinks packages/hw-transport/.flowconfig && flow-mono install-types --overwrite --ignoreDeps=peer || echo 'failed to setup flow-typed'
scripts.test: yarn run build && lerna run test && yarn run lint && yarn run prettier-diff
scripts.flow: lerna --ignore @ledgerhq/test --concurrency 1 run flow & sleep 600 && killall flow
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules/ packages/*/flow-typed/ packages/*/lib flow-typed
scripts.rebuild: lerna run clean && lerna run build
scripts.publish: yarn && lerna run clean && lerna run build && lerna publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
